items.content_html: A lightweight and robust CalDAV client for Node.js applications, written in TypeScript. This library enables seamless integration with CalDAV servers to manage calendars, events, and tasks.

items.content_html: 42resources is a lightweight browser extension designed to assist 42 students in finding relevant resources for their projects. It provides curated links to blogs, videos, and testing tools, making it easier for users to learn, debug, and improve their work.
items.title: open-source-multiverse/42resources-extention: 42resources is a lightweight browser extension designed to assist 42 students in finding relevant resources for their projects. It provides curated links to blogs, videos, and testing tools, making it easier for users to learn, debug, and improve their work.

items.content_html: MiniBlock 2D is a lightweight, 2D game. The goal of this project is to improve JavaScript skills while offering a fun, interactive experience for players. Whether youâ€™re a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!

Whether youâ€™re a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
